mapper.select: SELECT a.attendance_id AS attendanceId, u.unit AS unit, u.name AS username, a.status AS status, a.attendance_date AS attendanceDate FROM attendance a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.attendance_id = #{attendanceId}
